data.name: input.textInput
data.description: An simple node holding a text value and displays it as a label.
data.label: TEXT HERE

data.name: RuleIdentifier
data.description: The transferred value is stored as a usable identifier during further rule processing. The identifier is labeled and usable according to the text value of the node.
data.label: IDENTIFIER HERE

data.description: Adds a representation item to the model.
data.label: Example Text Here

data.description: Filters a list of IFC entities by their quantity value. Returns all entities that contain the quantity information.

data.description: Colorizes the Appearance of a MultiAppearanceShape3D to a specific color.
data.label: Example Text Here

data.description: Converts a String to a Vector3D list. (Example: x,y,z;x,y,z;... )

data.description: Checks if geometic object are close to each other based on their geometric definitions.

data.description: Checks if the bounds of geometic objects are intersecting.

data.description: Calculates the distance of bounds by proximity of their coordinates in cardinal directions.

data.description: Creates a spherical geometrie as RegionalBSPTree3D in provided precision for collision detection purposes.

data.name: geometry.decomposeVector3D
data.description: Decomposes a Vector3D into its elementary parts.

data.name: geometry.createPointGraph
data.description: Creates a raster of points in an area enclosed in an RegionalBSPTree3D area, producing nodes and edges.
data.label: Example Text Here

data.description: Computes nodes for a graph containing with certain parametric behavior, such as for creating triangles or quad patches.
data.label: Example Text Here

data.name: geometry.showGraphColoredByValues
data.description: Loads the graph information and displays it in the 3D viewer.
data.label: Example Text Here

data.name: geometry.createPointGraphEdges
data.description: Connects nodes of an graph by inserting edges of a certain stepsize, provided the nodes are already known.
data.label: Example Text Here

data.name: geometry.createPointGraphEdgesByReference
data.description: Connects nodes of an graph by inserting edges of a certain stepsize, provided the nodes are already known. Priorisation on reference nodes.
data.label: Example Text Here

data.name: geometry.groupGraphEdges
data.description: Groups edges thogether with its nodes, providing a map of assigned node to edge list pairs.
data.label: Example Text Here

data.name: geometry.unifyRegionBSPTree
data.description: Joins two RegionalBSPTree3D representations into one.
data.label: Example Text Here

data.name: geometry.calculateDistancesByOrderedGraphEdges
data.description: Performs a deepsearch based on distances from an start node to all reachable points in a graph.
data.label: Example Text Here

data.name: geometry.calculateAStarSearch
data.description: Performs a shortest path search based on distances from an start node to all reachable end nodes in a graph.
data.label: Example Text Here

data.name: geometry.checkLinecasts
data.description: Checks if a ray passing through the scene has an intersection with a geometric object.
data.label: Example Text Here

data.name: geometry.showGraph
data.description: Loads the graph information and displays it in the 3D viewer.
data.label: Example Text Here

data.name: geometry.showPaths
data.description: Loads the paths information and displays it in the 3D viewer.

data.description: Coverts a Point3d to Vector3D. An z-offset can be specified, if necessary.

data.description: Filters a list of elements by a list of of masking boolean values.
